lines: Started my career in automotive control software development, where automating tests improved efficiency by 20x â€” sparking a passion for solving real-world problems through technology.

After transitioning to web development, I led the 0-to-1 launch of a recruitment management SaaS and a full rebuild of a legacy system. Over 8 years, I built a full-stack skill set spanning GraphQL API design, database schema redesign, and clean architecture adoption.

I've also served as tech lead and scrum master for teams of 10+. Currently developing 3D simulation software with Three.js, while building the technical foundation for a new SaaS product with Next.js on the side.
